short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pretend to be any address on Solana dApps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension acts as a Solana wallet that allows you to connect to dApps using any valid address:

- Start by configuring the Solana wallet address you'd like to use by clicking on the extension icon in the Chrome menu bar (the extension only lets you input valid address). For instance, try H8sMJSCQxfKiFTCfDR3DUMLPwcRbM61LGFJ8N4dK3WjS.
- Open any dApp which supports the Solana Wallet Standard and you should see Impersolator show up as a wallet option. Click on it and the dApp will believe you're connected with the address you configured. For instance, try it on Jupiter (https://jup.ag/).

Obviously, it will not let you sign transactions but it can be useful for testing purposes, to see a cold storage address that you haven't added to your daily wallet, or simply to check out what a whale is up to.
